description.mekanismgenerators.advanced_: An advanced generator that directly absorbs the sun's rays to produce energy with little loss.
description.mekanismgenerators.bio_gener: A generator that burns organic materials from the world to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.electroma: A block that converts kinetic energy from a Rotational Complex into usable electricity. Any coil touching either the Rotational Complex itself, or another valid coil, will contribute to the energy produced.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r: A block that can be used to monitor or control the Fission Reactor with Redstone.
description.mekanismgenerators.gas_burni: A generator that burns varous gases to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.geotherma: Produces energy from geothermal sources in the environment, and improves protection against damage from heat sources. Install multiple for faster charging and greater protection.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: The reactor's core heat capacity has been met
The reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Will not emit a Redstone signal
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_r: The steel rod that is used to hold Turbine Blades within an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.wind_gene: A generator that uses the strength of the wind to produce energy, with greater efficiency at higher altitudes.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Could not form, no fuel assembly structures present.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_r: Could not form, invalid Turbine Rotor arrangement.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_even_: Could not form, width and length of structure must be odd.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Could not form, Electromagnetic Coil arrangement is malformed. Coils must be connected to Rotational Complex and adjacently connected.
Could not form, Pressure Disperser arrangement is malformed. Dispersers must create complete horizontal layer surrounding Rotational Complex.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Could not form, no Rotational Complex present.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_rotor: Could not form, rotors are invalid (non-contiguous).
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_too_n: Could not form, structure is too narrow to support turbine size.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_vent_: Could not form, found a Turbine Vent below Pressure Disperser layer. Vents must be at or above vertical position of disperser layer.
